module_description: Manage product purchases from suppliers with the Purchases module. Purchases are automatically added to your stock inventory and recorded in your expense tracking.
module_info_message: This module is only used for product purchases that will be added to your stock inventory. For non-stock expense transactions (service purchases, general expenses, etc.), use the Expenses module.
field_label_hint: Display name (e.g., Invoice Number, Delivery Date)
global_fields_info: Fields available for all purchases. You can add or remove these fields.
item_specific_fields_info: Fields specific to this purchase only. These fields will not appear on other purchases.
manage_global_fields_desc: Create, edit, or delete global fields that can be used in all purchases.
delete_global_field_message: Are you sure you want to delete this global field? This action cannot be undone. This field will be removed from all purchases.
no_global_fields_desc: You can add global fields by clicking the button above.
product_in_stock_message: Product "{{productName}}" is in stock (Stock: {{stock}}). Would you like to be redirected to Quick Purchase screen to increase stock?
is_stock_purchase_description: If checked, purchase will be for stock. If unchecked, it will be recorded as an expense.
stock_purchase_info: This product will be added to your stock inventory and you can sell it.
expense_purchase_info: This product will not be sold, it will only be recorded as an expense. You can view it in the Expenses module.
expense_purchase_warning: This purchase will be recorded as an expense and will not be added to your stock inventory.
expense_purchase_warning_description: Record products you won't sell as expenses. These products are not added to your stock inventory but can be viewed in the Expenses module.
purchase_type_info_description: Stock purchase: Product is added to your stock inventory and you can sell it. Expense purchase: Product is recorded as an expense and is not added to your stock inventory.
non_stock_items_count: {{count}} products will be recorded as expenses
stock_items_count: {{count}} products will be added to your stock inventory
